title: Portnoy's Complaint
content:
please excuse my ignorance, but can someone ID this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719235632im_/http:/typophile.com/files/A13191060509104736_3724.jpg)
author: hereandthere

comments.content: It's some variant of [Caslon Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719235632/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-caslon/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26seed%3D28%26dock%3D0%26size%3D57%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DPortnoy%25E2%2580%2599s%2520Complaint%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dsingle%252Cot.liga). The Font Bureau version in the link has two versions--one that's about the right weight but too condensed, and one the right width but not bold enough. There were a lot of film font versions of this, and I'm guessing it's one of them. The swashes were probably part of it, too, although they look like they are from a wider version.
